html:
Feb 4 (Reuters) - Wall Street securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several U.S.-listed companies, including Activision Blizzard, Intercontinental Exchange and Paylocity Holding, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Activision Blizzard Inc ATVI.O: Jefferies raises target price to $95 from $85

* Fulgent Genetics Inc FLGT.O: Piper Sandler assumes coverage with overweight rating

* Gitlab Inc GTLB.O: RBC raises to outperform from sector perform

* Intercontinental Exchange Inc ICE.N: CFRA raises to buy from hold

* Paylocity Holding Corp PCTY.O: Piper Sandler raises to overweight from neutral


Following is a summary of research actions on U.S. companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
